allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d azurk -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''messages'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d azurk -c "SELECT cp.conversation_id, cp.user_id, cp.is_muted, cp.last_read_at, u.name FROM conversation_participants cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.id;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d azurk -c "SELECT m.id, m.conversation_id, m.content, m.sender_id, u.name FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=admin123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d azurk -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reads FROM message_reads;")
